评论概述: Pants good jacket big, be careful ironing!!!
评论详情: I'm 5'9" about 145lbs I got medium. The pants are nice, without heels they touch the floor, so if you're shorter than me and not going to wear heels with a medium you'll probably have to hem them. However, I went to iron the pants before wearing, warm heat was not enough to remove wrinkles so I turned it up and as you see in photo 2 I melted them! The jacket has shoulder pads and these weird points of excess material, I tried my best to capture that in my photo. The jacket could be taken in about 2 inches or more where you button it. My pants were also missing the button hole, not a huge problem, I just slit it and put some glue so it doesn't tear or fray. I'm going to try to fix the jacket myself, I have some sewing abilities. Not sure what I'm going to do with the melted pants.

评论概述: Good for the Price - Pants Sizing Inconsistent
评论详情: I purchased this for my 17-year old daughter to wear to her high school’s Mock Trial tournament. For the price, I feel it is a nice suit.  One issue we ran into is with the sizing of the pants. The XS has an elastic waistband and while they fit her, an extra 1” would be better. We tried a size S as well, but the pants were huge in the waist. No elastic and no belt loops so there was nothing we could do short of using a safety pin. I ordered a second set in a size small thinking maybe it was a fluke with the first pair; however, the pants once again did not have elastic and were too big in the waist. We wound up returning the smalls and kept the XS. She is happy with the suit so that’s good enough for me.  For reference, she is 5’8, 124 lbs, 28” waist, 28DD

There is no stretch to the material whatsoever.

评论概述: Great Suit, but had to have it tailored
评论详情: The color of the suit and material deliver as advertised. I am 5'8" tall and weigh 145 lbs. I ordered a medium. The pants fit perfectly, but the jacket was a little large. I had to have the jacket tailored, for an additional fee, to get "that tailored look." It was totally worth it.  I get a lot of compliments whenever I wear this suit. Even though it is machine washable, I dry clean and the suit seems to be holding up well. All-in-all, the tailoring cost and the dry cleaning cost, plus the cost of the suit are less than the amount I would spend on a higher end suit to get the same look.  Love this suit.

I gave it a chance, knowing I would probably be disappointed and I was right. The jacket fits very loose while the pants fit correctly so I feel like the ideal body shape for this suit needs to be like an upside down triangle. I am more pear-shaped so the jacket in an extra large was loose and ill fitting on me where the pants fit, however, instead of being slim pants, they were almost wide legged, bigger than a boot cut leg and I didn’t like that. So return, it goes
great

This is a frustrating review to write.  What many have already said, I agree with. This is a pretty nice suit for the price. Its polyester. Jacket is lined. Pants are not.  There are no pockets on the pants. It is a SLIM cut.  It is also oddly or dare I say mis-sized.  The pants and jacket don’t match size wise.  The pants are too big while the jacket is too small.  The arms of the jacket are too tight and you can barely raise your arms.  While the pants are literally fall off and dragging the floor.  I am 5”6 175lbs.  I typically wear a solid size 10. (Target,,Old Navy).  I wear size Large shirts.  Bust is ample size 36 DD.  I first purchased a Large. It did not work.  It can be worn. But very uncomfortable.  Jacket was so tight I can’t raise my arms properly. Arms too tight and the pants thigh area are too tight.  Then I purchased XL. With this the jacket fits better but the arms and shoulder is still tight.  The pants are falling down.  This is unfortunate because its a good value for the money.  Sadly, this will be a return.  Hopefully the seller or Amazon would actually care to read some of these reviews.  Sizing is typical of Asian sellers…..they often get it wrong.  If you can get the size to fit. Great. This is not for curvy women.
The pants zipper and button broke the first time I wore it.

The suit came with this mark on the collar and lapel of the jacket. However after washing, it came out. The material is a good thick quality with lining. However the fit felt a bit big and I will size down on the next one. I  did not expect the pants to have elastic in the waistline. Overall I am pleased and would recommend this suit. (Size L)

Can’t wait to wear this suit. I bought it in several more colors (purple; pink; navy; turquoise). It comes beautifully packaged with instructions on how to refold.
